author: arfrever
msg: Use svn_io_file_checksum2() instead of deprecated svn_io_file_checksum().

author: arfrever
msg: Try to use `pkg-config neon` instead of `neon-config`.
* configure.ac: Search for pkg-config before searching for Neon.

author: danielsh
msg: Fix 'svnadmin recover' of packed FSFS repositories.
Use open_pack_or_rev_file() instead of svn_fs_fs__path_rev() to look
Document the specific error returned for non-existing revision/pack files.

author: hwright
msg: Add a parenthetical to each of the blocker items state who is currently
working on it.  Also, remove issue #3343 from the optional list, if it
becomes a blocking item for release, we can revisit it.
